Hi,

I'm using the DirectoryModuleCatalogue to load my modules. The only problem is that any dependencies my modules have also have to be present in this folder. The result is a really messy Module folder. Is there a way to do this more cleanly? E.g. Each module has it's own subdirectory so that it and it's dependencies are tidied away together. Or can the module be kept in a zip file, a la Silverlight XAPs?

 

Neil
